page.title: 13Games We Play In Newburgh
page.content: The games we play at home are a lot different from the games we play at school.The most popular game at school is High's Dell and at home it is British Bulldogs or Join the Crew.For this you need people and some open space with no obstacles, whereas for High's Dell,an open space and some objects that are up high are needed. To play High's Dell you need an open space.The school playground or your garden is the best place.You need more than 2 to play. You have someone who is"man" and is trying to tig you or get you. Anything high is dell or a safe place from him.If"man" gets you you become"man" and you have to chase everyone in the game.To play British Bulldogs or Join the Crew you need more than 3 people and 1"man".You decide if it is going to be lift them or teen them.If caught you are"man."
